### Heating and Air Conditioning Services Tender - CFHA - Esquimalt

**Tender Reference Number:** WS4203621477-Doc4232448920

**Procurement Notice Status:** Closed

The Canadian Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Canadian Forces Housing Agency (CFHA) is soliciting quotations for heating and air conditioning services for the CFHA properties in Esquimalt. The contract aims to provide cost-effective maintenance and minor improvement services to the Crown-owned portfolio.

### Key Tender Details

* **Tender Number:** WS4203621477
* **Closing Date:** November 29, 2023, at 14:00 EST
* **Amendment Date:** November 6, 2023
* **Estimated Contract Start Date:** April 1, 2024
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Entity:** Department of National Defence (DND)

### Solicitation Method

This tender is open to any firm that wishes to submit a bid. Bidders must be able to provide cost-effective maintenance and minor improvement services for the Crown-owned portfolio.

### Evaluation Criteria

* The lowest price

### Services

* Heating and cooling and air conditioning HVAC installation and maintenance service

### Location

* British Columbia
* Victoria

### Trade Agreements

The awarded contract will be subject to the principles of the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) and Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), as well as other trade agreements.

### Contact Information

* Christine Seguin (PSPC/SPAC) – christine.seguin@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Tender Documents and Details

Please submit all required supporting documentation and bid submissions by the closing date and time. All bids submitted after the closing time will be declared non-responsive.

This announcement has been updated to reflect the amendment that the closing time is Nov. 29, 2023 at 14:00 EST. All quotes are to be submitted to the Contracting Authority by the same time and date.
